NetSparkleUpdater.​Interfaces.​ICheckingForUpdates
public interface
NetSparkleUpdater.​Interfaces.​ICheckingForUpdates
NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​Avalonia.​CheckingForUpdatesWindow
NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​WinForms.​CheckingForUpdatesWindow
NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​WPF.​CheckingForUpdatesWindow

Interface for UIs that tell the user that SparkleUpdater is checking for updates

Events
UpdatesUIClosing
event EventHandler UpdatesUIClosing

Event to fire when the checking for updates UI is closing

Functions
Show
void Show()

Show the checking for updates UI

Close
void Close()

Close the window/UI that shows the checking for updates UI
